EmailTemplate.description: Email to rep to notify request has been cancelled
EmailTemplate.name: WRF Auto Close
EmailTemplate.subject: WRF {!Case.CaseNumber} Request Cancelled - No response to Awaiting Information
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Case.WRF_Requestor_Name__c},
We have not received the required information from you and your request for {!Case.Account} is being cancelled. If you still need this request completed. Please submit a new request through the Work Request process and provide all needed information.
Click here to see the cancelled request.
Thank you,
Pricing & Profitability
